solution_line_template: The cost of Dale's toast is {dale_toast_slices} × ${toast_cost} = $<<{dale_toast_slices}*{toast_cost}={dale_toast_cost}>>{dale_toast_cost}.
The cost of Andrew's toast is {andrew_toast_slices} × ${toast_cost} = $<<{andrew_toast_slices}*{toast_cost}={andrew_toast_cost}>>{andrew_toast_cost}.
The cost of Dale's eggs is {dale_eggs} × ${egg_cost} = $<<{dale_eggs}*{egg_cost}={dale_egg_cost}>>{dale_egg_cost}.
The cost of Andrew's eggs is {andrew_eggs} × ${egg_cost} = $<<{andrew_eggs}*{egg_cost}={andrew_egg_cost}>>{andrew_egg_cost}.
